channel.title: Deep Learning on StatWizard
channel.description: Recent content in Deep Learning on StatWizard

item.title: Generative AI Text-to-Text Models - Part 2
item.description: This is the 2nd blog post on Generative AI and Prompting Techniques blog series. In this post, we dive into encoder-decoder generative AI models and the key tunable settings for the Text-to-Text generative AI models.

item.title: Designing Prompts: Generative AI Series - Part 3
item.description: This is a series of blog posts on Generative AI and Prompting Techniques. In this post of Generative AI series, we will look into what prompt engineering is, and how to design better prompts to leverage the power of Generative AI in your typical use-cases.

item.title: Introduction to Generative AI - Part 1
item.description: This is a series of blog posts on Generative AI and Prompting Techniques. This post serves as a introduction to the generative AI, its related techniques.

item.title: Texture Networks
item.description: In this post, I analyse Texture Network, a special type of neural network to synthesize textures and performing Neural Style Transfer, the art of mixing the content of a picture with the style from another picture.
